title: Share Your Best URF Moments
body:
U.R.F. may be over, but our favorite manatee’s spirit remains in our memories. And by memories, we mean internet videos with airhorns and stuff. Check out some of our favorites below (don’t forget to unmute the Vines by clicking the bottom right corner!), and tell us about *your* best URF moments and epic plays in the comments.


1. Can't killean the Zilean 
https://vine.co/v/eBtJBFptnrT 
**Video by [Kshaway](https://vine.co/v/eBtJBFptnrT)** 

2. What would Lustboy do?
https://vine.co/v/OlmZMr6XzzO
**Vine by [League Boy](https://vine.co/v/OlmZMr6XzzO)**

3. Who needs Teleport, anyway?
https://vine.co/v/eBMBYUrwlM7 
**Video by [ThePeacePigeon](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YuANivA15zo); Vine by [The Best Bard](https://vine.co/v/eBMBYUrwlM7)**

4. A magical journey indeed...
https://vine.co/v/eBh9WmdLAWQ 
**Vine by [League Boy](https://vine.co/v/eBh9WmdLAWQ)**

5. When Urf visits his hometown 
https://vine.co/v/eBJVlaVhmiT 
**Vine by [Blake of Legends](https://vine.co/v/eBJVlaVhmiT )**

6. U.R.F. theme remix?
https://vine.co/v/eBdMgLK1aZY 
**Vine by [Inxanity](https://vine.co/v/eBdMgLK1aZY )**

7. MLG 360 Ashe Noscope 
https://youtu.be/vLljN4qocco
**Video by [LoLHowTo](https://youtu.be/vLljN4qocco)**

8. We’ve all been there...
https://youtu.be/5TA-s1zq3Ak
**Video by [ROBERTxLEE](https://youtu.be/5TA-s1zq3Ak)**

9. Two words you’d never think you’d see
https://youtu.be/5uNRcE56VBs
**Video by [yeahramie](https://youtu.be/5uNRcE56VBs)**

10. Welcome to Hook City
https://youtu.be/wTiWaXYiIUk
**Video by [Vandiril](https://youtu.be/wTiWaXYiIUk)**

11. Why this manatee look like he’s about to drop the most fire album of 2015
https://youtu.be/9SXkWcNH9cQ
**Video by [blakinola](https://youtu.be/9SXkWcNH9cQ)**

replies.body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RnaMF7VYcEM

Global Ults Lilypichu

My biggest regret in life was not having seen this video until today.

I lost it when the enemy team started using Zhonya's when they spawned in base, haha!

My friends and I got a great result out of that too...
Lucian ended up 1/28...spent half the game in base. 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=53aRXw72Xgk

Playing AP Ez with a Luden's echo. The enemy teams shaco was extremely low and went invis as he was running off. I missed hitting him with my ult but hit the scuttle crab, procing Ludens and bouncing to the invis shaco.
Scuttle is the real MVP

Playing Vladimir with Zhonya's Hourglass.

I'm immortal.
Vlad was one of my main bans. Sucker could 1v5 a team.

> [{quoted}](name=wirsindderjaeger,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=qTWVXlkf,comment-id=00190000,timestamp=2015-04-14T20:42:48.194+0000)
>
> Vlad was one of my main bans. Sucker could 1v5 a team.

Vlad has long been a main of mine and one of my go to picks in URF. End game perma pool always amazing.

Man i was 1v5ing right outside of their fountain as minions took the nexus without {{item:3157}}  

vlad was soooo fun

How I played AP champions in URF : {{item:3089}} {{item:3157}} {{item:3285}} {{item:3285}} {{item:3285}} {{item:3285}} 

Then theres that moment when I'm playing Ezreal and try to ult up mid lane so they cant push and I accidentally one-shot someone in their base from full life.

Rabadon's passive works, but it can't stack. one is necessary. One zhonyas, because the active is unique: can't stack, and the rest luden's echo, because the **movement speed** does stack. This is the most AP you can get with benefits from items. 
{{item:3089}} {{item:3157}} {{item:3285}} {{item:3285}} {{item:3285}} {{item:3285}}
double {{item:3512}} {{item:3060}} heimer and malzar ultra pushing was so unfair
Using Nautilus in general was the best thing about URF. Spamming Riptide every second walking up and down then lane like "Yeah go ahead come at me. I got the ocean at my footsteps."

{{champion:154}}  solo baron with one button (w) was funny to watch.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=64yHT5khGbo)
I should have recorded my {{champion:31}} {{champion:53}} perma-knock-up-silence game...
AD Poppy. That is all. Level 3 double kill.

Urgot penta
http://i.imgur.com/IhGnzfP.png
[](http://i.imgur.com/IhGnzfP.png)

My favorite moment was when I was playing {{champion:99}} and went up against {{champion:25}} and {{champion:41}} at bot lane. I was pushing out when {{champion:25}} snared me and {{champion:41}} started shooting me, taking out about half my health. I had given up at that moment but thought "hey, I'm not going to die without a fight." So I threw my Q at them, then tossed out my E and kinda just squeezed my eyes shut and hit R and heard my laptop scream at me "DOUBLE KILL." 

I laughed so hard.
Going 5 top and rushing Banner of Command and Zz'Rot.  We won the game in 10 mins while being a solid 20 kills down.
Evelynn's Q. Nuff said.

{{champion:37}} Got my first Penta
{{champion:432}} We did a healing team comp and won in 10 minutes (I was Bard)
{{summoner:12}} {{item:3361}} Whole team teleported to a ward and killed somebody
{{champion:26}} Self explanitory
{{champion:25}} Nobody move! I got a snare!
{{champion:3}} Never died
{{champion:57}} First blood lol
{{champion:117}} With my friend as {{champion:75}} (BIG wombo combo(Also used Cho'gath)
That's all I can think of.

My personal favorite moment in URF that I did was when I took 3 of my friends and got a quadra queue, and we played {{champion:16}} , {{champion:37}} , {{champion:76}} , and {{champion:40}} . We so happened to have a badass {{champion:111}}  on our team, which helped.

Anyway.... Nautilus walked into the enemy base at 10ish minutes. He solo'd the bot lane inhib turret while us healers spammed W's (Or in the case of {{champion:76}}  and {{champion:40}} , E's). Took an inhib, and the mid lane inhib turret. 

Later in the game, {{champion:37}} and {{champion:16}}  2v5 and win, simply because full AP soraka heals for too much and full AP sona does TONS OF DAMAGE. (Zing!)

Anyway, it was amazing. Galio is also hilarious, can 1v1 turrets with only a rank 5 heal, which is really early when it comes to 1v1ing turrets.
NEXT PTL OPENING RIGHT HERE
I loved to play {{champion:78}}  because I just never died :3

I was laning with my friend, him as zilean and me as Sion. He would put a bomb on a minion, and I would shout it towards the enemy.  We never lost with that comp... I mean cause the rest of the team was good, but it was hilarious
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Pig-XbRxRj8 Had to make montage...
My best moment was crushing {{champion:76}} in lane as {{champion:122}}  :)  I avoided her spears and viciously stomped my way to lane victory.  It was pretty glorious...tough though!

That moment after you lock in Veigar to see the other team completely composed of AP carries and healers. MUAAAAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAH.

But really, put veigar in a duo lane so he doesn't get shutdown and your looking at a champ that can single button press 100-0 any AP squishy at the 15 min mark. (Its not OP cause assassins and tank stills eat him for breakfast)
1v2 bot lane as ad malz, 7min inhib thats all i have to say

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qPDvBgL6mB4

hangtime i got as malzahar against kassadin via malphite and malz ult.

Sona PentaKill!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mP6OxsTAct8
cool video! SO MUCH DAMAGE - the Q+Auto combos are taking like 60% life...! That's why I always run from Sona no matter what game mode it is :)
Dont you mean...tons of damage? http://img2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20140716201826/leagueoflegends/images/7/7f/Phreak_%26_Tons_of_Damage.jpg
I do now.

https://youtu.be/tC7t1LXyoLY

Fizz penta I got.
Me and my friend also did the Shaco Blitz and it won almost all our games it wasn't banned in

I really wish I had recorded  this, but I ulted into the baron pit as Ahri while the enemy team was doing baron, threw out an orb and foxfire and then ulted out. The Orb on it's way back was what stole the baron. Then I did it again as Lulu except I teleported on a ward that was inside the baron pit, popped an E and glitter glance on the baron and flashed out with a baron buff. Probably the most exciting thing to happen to me during URF. Too bad I lost both games...{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

I know I'm a little late to the party but my favorite moment was when I went 39-0-8 as Zed here is proof for you nonbelievers http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/1789466455/42878985?tab=overview
My Rengar in Urf was legendary! Got a triple kill by myself and stole the baron. {{champion:107}} {{item:3077}}

my 2 favorite moments of URF come from when I was queued with my friends. Playing as Master Yi, enemy team is destroying us, easily killing 2 or 3 of our team in fights, pushing all lanes, I spawned back up, and teleported bot, hit my ult, busted 3 towers, got killed, spawned back up, went bot again, Galio comes both with me, enemy Ezreal comes to stop us, gets melted, we push inhib and nexus before they can even recall back to base to stop us. Second was when Swar ports in as hecacopter to a ward in the enemy base, our Kat is low on hp and they've got a Shaco closing in for a kill, Suddenly pony express and shaco is a splatter mark before he pushes the nexus and finishes the game.
6 min deathcap as {{champion:1}}

My favourite moment has to go to AP J4 which I got the idea from ThePeacePigeon's video
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YuANivA15zo

Had to try it and loved it for being so dumb XD
Swag Flag too strong {{champion:59}}

Gotta go fast Rammus in urf was pretty awesome! 
https://youtu.be/yslBwDdKMgA

So my greatest moments in U.R.F. mode this season were face smashing people as Leona! Constant stealth jukes with Wu-Kong (Yes I am a part of the reason he was banned). I also had one very amazing game as Irelia. I went Irelia top with a Soraka against a Morgana and someone else. I died constantly to Morgana and my Soraka got salty with me. So what  did I do? I went and jungled. All this left open exp and gold left to waste away and so I went to jungle. I regained my levels, regained my strength, and lost the game with 41 kills and the strongest carry in the game. Soraka wasnt salty for very long, only until we still managed to lose. A lost game but a very fun memory.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-WEbTYCHSi4

When projectiles are being spammed at you in lane, then you finally hit 6 and get your revenge. :)
{{champion:105}}  was my favorite champion, and i got this great quad on him. It was so much fun to see ppl melt right before your eyes
My first {{champion:143}}  PENTA   so many plants!
